description:
Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using Net.EXE
Check if the user that executed the commands is suspicious (e.g. service accounts, LOCAL_SYSTEM)
name: Suspicious Group And Account Reconnaissance Activity Using Net.EXE
query: ((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe)) OR (process.pe.original_file_name:(net.exe OR net1.exe))) AND ((((process.command_line:(*domain\ admins* OR *\ administrator* OR *\ administrateur* OR *enterprise\ admins* OR *Exchange\ Trusted\ Subsystem* OR *Remote\ Desktop\ Users* OR *Utilisateurs\ du\ Bureau\ Ã \ distance* OR *Usuarios\ de\ escritorio\ remoto* OR *\ \/do*)) AND (process.command_line:(*\ group\ * OR *\ localgroup\ *))) AND (NOT process.command_line:*\ \/add*)) OR (process.command_line:*\ \/do* AND process.command_line:*\ accounts\ *))
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), omkar72, @svch0st, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
